EmailTemplate.name: 2016 SATCOM1 Dubai Evite.2016 SATCOM1 Dubai Evite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited to the GoDirect Cabin Connectivity Conference in Dubai
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387]]> <[[http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero]]> <[[http://www.youtube.com/honeywell]]> <[[https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475]]> <[[http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Invitation: Honeywell Aero Connectivity Conference in Dubai 2016 Hello! We are excited to invite you to our annual Aero Connectivity Conference in Dubai, which will take place on 12 October. We ask that you save the date and register to attend. The conference has been developed to provide you with information and updates about the latest satellite communications products & services. You can expect an updates from Honeywell, Satcom1, Inmarsat and ViaSat. We will also share results of the JetConneX Ka-Band lab tests ran on the Honeywell JetWave hardware in our office at Le Bourget, Paris.
The venue for this event is the Sheraton Jumeriah Beach Resort <[[http://www.sheratonjumeirahbeach.com/]]>. Please book your reservations if accommodations are needed. We do not offer a room block or discount and space is limited. Thank you and we look forward to seeing you at the event.
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2016/october/aero-connectivity-conference-in-dubai]]>
Click here to reserve your seat. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2016/october/aero-connectivity-conference-in-dubai]]>
More detailed agenda will follow soon.
Raghed Talih
Aftermarket Sales Director
